summary: Encapsulates all configuration and styling information for a line chart, including data points, visual attributes such as color, gradient, curvature, dash patterns, stroke width, and fill areas above or below the line, as well as point and shadow details. Provides helper utilities for accessing child elements and control identifiers.
business_intent: To supply a structured, customizable representation of a line chart's appearance and data that can be consumed by a UI rendering engine or charting library, allowing developers to tailor visual aspects and interaction states of the chart component.
